scripts.test: yarn test:core && yarn test:orm-query && yarn test:orm-connector && yarn test:socket && yarn test:service && yarn test:orm-service-wrap
scripts.build: yarn build:core && yarn build:orm-common && concurrently "yarn build:orm-query" "yarn build:orm-connector" "yarn build:socket-common" && concurrently "yarn build:socket-server" "yarn build:socket-client" && concurrently "yarn build:service-container" "yarn build:service-interface" && yarn build:orm-service-wrap
scripts.test:core: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tests/core/tsconfig.json cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --include packages/core/src/** --extension .ts mocha --require ts-node/register --require tsconfig-paths/register tests/core/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.test:orm-query: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tests/orm-query/tsconfig.json cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --include packages/orm-query/src/** --extension .ts mocha --require ts-node/register --require tsconfig-paths/register tests/orm-query/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.test:orm-connector: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tests/orm-connector/tsconfig.json cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --include packages/orm-connector/src/** --include packages/orm-common/src/** --extension .ts mocha --require ts-node/register --require tsconfig-paths/register tests/orm-connector/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.test:socket: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tests/socket/tsconfig.json cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --include packages/socket-client/src/** --include packages/socket-server/src/** --include packages/socket-common/src/** --extension .ts mocha --require ts-node/register --require tsconfig-paths/register tests/socket/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.test:service: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tests/service/tsconfig.json cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --include packages/service-container/src/** --include packages/service-interface/src/** --extension .ts mocha --require ts-node/register --require tsconfig-paths/register tests/service/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.test:orm-service-wrap: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tests/orm-service-wrap/tsconfig.json cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --include packages/orm-service-wrap/src/** --extension .ts mocha --require ts-node/register --require tsconfig-paths/register tests/orm-service-wrap/**/*.spec.ts
